On 08.06.2009, at 03:25, Jan Algermissen wrote:

> Not of the detail application/order. OTH, if the UBL was not intended
> as a pure message passing format but would go about and define its own
> media types we would be pretty close. UBL has the whole order-
> acceptance collaboration well defined and minting a set of media types
> from that would not be a problem, IMHO.

I agree. I've recently started to advocate using a media type for a  
collection of related documents - something about halfway between  
application/xml and application/vnd.my-company.order+xml (e.g. in this  
case, it might be application/ubl-procurement+xml).

Stefan
